title: Inting
body: Ok so I got in a game, and the adc showed he was going to play Sett, I never had any luck with a sett adc,  so i made the commit that he was going to feed. Then the enemy team ban sett, i thought to myself "thank god", the this dude is super pissed and told me he was going to feed now, So we get in game and the guy and his duo keep saying they were going to feed, so they died 2 mins, then told my lane in /all that they were coming to help, The dude runs in under tower and just dies, did that 2 more times. I just keep my cool and keep playing, I started winning my lane even thought the enemy had 3 kills, So i killed my lane and the adc says in all chat "you need more help, i will come mid some more" and you proceeded to give my lane 2 more kills. Some how we still won that game, i reported the adc for inting and just looked at there match history and this player is still playing. Why does riot allow these people to keep playing. This is why we have so many people who rage and get chat ban. I wanted to yell at this person so bad, but if i did, i would have been punished. Not the person who tried to ruin everyone game. Riot needs to get there shit together.

replies.body:
the instant gratification you're looking for will never happen, best to change your expectations

the game has 10's of millions of players, all submitting thousands upon thousands of "int'ing" reports every single day

expecting someone to be punished the minute after you push report is just unrealistic
lol ok, how long do you think it should take?

or you could just, ya know, move on with life?

don't you think you've given an internet troll enough of your time and energy? (the exact things they want you to waste on them btw)

aaaaannnnnnndddd _there_ goes any chance you had for a discussion.

just couldn't resist the petty insults huh? because god forbid anyone has more than one account. Why would anyone have a tryhard account for buying their SR favorites for playing ranked and another for buying their ARAM favorites and fucking around right?

what a pathetic deflection
Discussion?????? all you did in your last post was tell me to move on with my life, there is no discussion.

Because you’re pointlessly wasting time waiting for Daddy Riot to send you a notification about someone you’re opgg stalking receiving punishment? 

That player is just 1 out of millions you’ll play with, so unless you’re diamond+ the chances of you seeing him ever again is extremely low.
well the way you are talking whats the point of reporting anyone?, i will never see them in another game. right?

Because it's a service to the community. Maybe your report didn't push his account over the edge - but the NEXT report might - and that will keep that trolling account out of other games.

Who knows - maybe there are OTHER inters that were banned by OTHER people before they ever even had a chance to play in your game - so you never saw them!

In other words, we all do our little part, and hopefully the result is greater than the sum of its parts. For the greater good. And for science. :D
that post deserves all the upvotes
I like the science part. That made me a little giddy. Because it's true, even if just a little bit.

and what about my first post?

there's a rant section if you just want to yell about shit

you literally asked why an unconfirmed int'er was not punished immediately, get off your high horse

later{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
5 - 10 days probably.

I mean char has a point.. no point in Trying to thrive on it. 

BUT.. i do agree there should be a instant or quicker way of punishing int feeders.
it isn't fair that people int feed then go on into 4-5 other games doing it again or trolling more before any thing is even down about it. 

but as char stated there are millions of games going on soo its hard to expect that kinda stuff instantly

Problem with inting reports is that plenty of people report teammates simply because they did poorly. Not only does Riot have to actually sift through the BS reports, which I'd say 95%+ of them are, but it's also not just one game that gets taken into account for inting. There has to be a history of it. One game of someone going 0-20 is highly unlikely to cause them to get banned unless there are other circumstances involved.
based on the comments here im surprised mods didnt close this thread up yet

> i made the commit that he was going to feed

Even if he wasnt going to feed , that right there tilted him so he fed. >.> what did you expect to get from your toxicity?
As long as people like you have nothing better to do than be mad, trolls gonna troll.

Lol, what?

I wait until angry kids like you burn out before i play ranked each season. Dont talk trash just because you are on the high end of low rank or whatever.

What almost literally everyone else said is a good response to the thread, almost +1s all around.

Also. The report system is NOT for your gratification. That in itself is toxic. It is the mindset of the violent mob. Do not let the misbehavior of others let you feel justified in doling out punishment. That is not what the report system is for. See Father Darius' comment.

Lol I dont think it takes a feeder for you to be toxic. All it took was a fucking champ pick and you already said he would feed lol. I dont get why people do that. Maybe thats why i rarely run into trolls and inters... because I dont poke the fucking bear man. Anyway, try reporting outside the client with support. Hope he gets banned.

Why are you surprised?

It's about inting. They way to make them punished is to bait them somehow into ZT words.
